SELECT cash_no as cashNo, cash_find as cashFind, category_name as categoryName, cash_price as cashPrice, cash_place as cashPlace, cash_memo as cashMemo FROM cash WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cash_date = #{cashDate} ORDER BY cash_no ASC
